{{Description|When travelers step into this lonesome hall, the [[Primal Construct|ancient mechanisms]] and [[Eremites|desert bandits]] that have been patrolling the place will emerge from the shadows, determined to punish the reckless intruders...|Fading Rumination}}
'''Fane of Panjvahe''' is a [[One-Time Domain]] located in [[The Sands of Three Canals]], [[Desert of Hadramaveth]], [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]]. It contains one level, '''Fading Rumination'''.

==Ley Line Disorder==
The following Ley Line Disorder is applied in this domain:
{| class="wikitable"
!Level
!Ley Line Disorder
|-
!align="center" | Fading Rumination
|When a [[Spread]] or [[Aggravate]] reaction is triggered, an Electro shockwave will be unleashed from the location of the triggered reaction, dealing True Electro AoE DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 6s.
|}
